channel.title: How install Nymphemeral?
channel.description:
I saw your sites blog post about how awesome Nymphemeral is and tried to install but am having no success. Could someone please document this process?
Needed to install pip so wget https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py sudo python get-pip.py sudo pip install nymphemeral nymphemeral
That loads the program fine but how do I make an icon for the program or add it to my Kickoff Application Launcher?
Also it says to change the mix configuration file in https://nymphemeral.readthedocs.org/en/latest/install/mixmaster-whonix.html#mixmaster-whonix
~/.Mix/mix.cfg CHAIN *,*,*,*,* SMTPRELAY localhost
Will that mess up the regular mixmaster settings and cause issues since the current settings are:
SMTPRELAY 1.1.1.1 SMTPRELAY 2.2.2.2
Thanks. Any help to maintain the security and ensure the command line mixmaster keeps working are greatly appreciated.

item.title: How install Nymphemeral?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Thanks you for trying Nymphemeral. The author Felipe Dau is still working on support for Whonix (and many other interesting features!). Everything seems to work when I followed the instructions from the manual. If you are finding problems please report it at Nymphemeralâ€™s github page.

Read full topic

item.title: How install Nymphemeral?
item.dc:creator: guffguys2
item.description:
I saw your sites blog post about how awesome Nymphemeral is and tried to install but am having no success. Could someone please document this process?

Needed to install pip so wget https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py
sudo python get-pip.py
sudo pip install nymphemeral
nymphemeral

That loads the program fine but how do I make an icon for the program or add it to my Kickoff Application Launcher?

Also it says to change the mix configuration file in https://nymphemeral.readthedocs.org/en/latest/install/mixmaster-whonix.html#mixmaster-whonix

~/.Mix/mix.cfg
CHAIN ,,,,*
SMTPRELAY localhost

Will that mess up the regular mixmaster settings and cause issues since the current settings are:

SMTPRELAY 1.1.1.1
SMTPRELAY 2.2.2.2

Thanks. Any help to maintain the security and ensure the command line mixmaster keeps working are greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
